DataElement.preferredName: Biological Parent Ashkenazi Jewish Heritage Indicator Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether or not the biological parents are of Ashkenazi Jewish decent and to identify the affected parental relationship.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A mother or a father; the immediate progenitor._Ashkenazi Jews, also called Ashkenazim, are Jews who are descendants of Jews from Germany, Poland, Austria and Eastern Europe._Something handed down from the past, such as a tradition, birthright, or inherited traits.
